turns.content: Generate DECISION MATRIX for next actions. Score each on: IMPACT (1-10), EFFORT (1-10 low=easy), RISK (1-10 low=safe), DEPENDENCY (blocked by what). Output as table with PRIORITY SCORE = IMPACT / (EFFORT * RISK).
